alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alvin, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Pasadena, southeastern Pearland, League City, Texas City, Friendswood, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Webster, Hitchcock, southeastern Manvel, Clear Lake, southeastern South Belt / Ellington, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, Hillcrest, Liverpool, The Johnson Space Center and Ellington Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
